title: Georgia Love and Lee Elliott tease fans as they attend friend's wedding
text:
She recently got engaged three years after meeting the man of her dreams on the second season of The Bachelorette.

And on Friday, Georgia Love looked like the picture of happiness as she attended a friends wedding in Melbourne.

Taking to Instagram, the 31-year-old shared a sweet photo of herself and her fiancé, Lee Elliott, while dropping another one of her not-so-subtle hints.

'Weddings are fun, think we should have one?' Georgia Love and Lee Elliott teased fans on Friday as they attended a friends wedding in Melbourne

'These wedding things are fun, think we should have one?!' a cheeky Georgia wrote in the caption.

In the photo, the lovebirds who were engaged last month looked positively radiant, beaming as they posed for photographs together.

Lee looked particularly dapper in a fitted navy tuxedo, while Georgia stunned in a bold pink Mossman dress, aptly called 'the life of the party dress'.

We found love: Lee looked particularly dapper in a fitted navy tuxedo, while Georgia stunned in a bold pink Mossman dress, aptly called 'the life of the party dress'.

Georgia accessorised with a pair of statement earrings and snake-embossed open-toe pumps that accentuated her toned pins.

She completed her fun look, wearing her honey blonde tresses in an effortlessly chic loose curl that hung over her shoulders.

The former journalist shot to fame in 2016 on the second season of Channel Ten's popular dating series The Bachelorette.

Happy ending: The couple finally announced their engagement in September after first dropping hints to media in 2017

And in the time since her appearance on the show Georgia and Lee have remained committed to keeping the public interested in their personal lives.

The smitten pair have become notorious for fueling the media firestorm that surrounds their relationship.

The two first teased their engagement in 2017, only to reiterate the sentiment over and over again until Lee finally popped the question in September.

Despite their questionable media tactics, their relationship has defied critics, with their love affair still going strong and a rumoured baby on the way.
description: She recently got engaged three years after meeting the man of her dreams on the second season of The Bachelorette.
authors: Joe Scek For Daily Mail Australia
